statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_event_details;
SELECT event_type, event_date, photographer_name FROM fashion_event_details;
SELECT event_id, event_location FROM fashion_event_details WHERE event_type = 'Fashion Show';
SELECT * FROM fashion_event_details WHERE photographer_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_location FROM fashion_event_details WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fashion_event_details WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_type, event_date, event_location FROM fashion_event_details WHERE event_type = 'Fashion Show';
SELECT event_location, event_date, event_type, photographer_name FROM fashion_event_details WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, photographer_name, event_location FROM fashion_event_details WHERE event_location LIKE '%Paris%' AND event_type = 'Runway';
SELECT * FROM fashion_event_details WHERE event_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM runway_shows;
SELECT show_id, show_name, show_date FROM runway_shows WHERE designer_name='Chanel';
SELECT show_name, designer_name FROM runway_shows WHERE show_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM product_launches ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT brand_name, launch_date FROM product_launches WHERE launch_location='Paris';
SELECT * FROM runway_shows WHERE show_location = 'Paris';
SELECT show_name, designer_name FROM runway_shows WHERE show_date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT launch_name FROM product_launches WHERE brand_name = 'Nike' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM runway_shows JOIN product_launches ON runway_shows.show_location = product_launches.launch_location;
SELECT DISTINCT show_location FROM runway_shows;
SELECT * FROM RunwayShows;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM ProductLaunches WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM ProductLaunches WHERE product_name LIKE '%smart%';
SELECT event_name, designer FROM RunwayShows WHERE designer = 'Gucci';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM EventAttendees WHERE event_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM RunwayShows WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, designer FROM RunwayShows ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, product_name FROM RunwayShows JOIN ProductLaunches ON RunwayShows.event_id = ProductLaunches.event_id;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM EventAttendees WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM EventAttendees GROUP BY event_id HAVING total_attendees > 10;
SELECT * FROM RunwayShows;
SELECT event_name, location FROM ProductLaunches WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM RunwayShows WHERE location = 'Paris' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM RunwayShows WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT event_name, specialty FROM Photographers JOIN Images ON Photographers.photographer_id = Images.photographer_id;
SELECT * FROM RunwayShows WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM ProductLaunches WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT photographer_name, specialty, contact_information FROM Photographers WHERE specialty = 'Fashion';
SELECT event_name, image_url, image_description FROM RunwayShows rs JOIN Images i ON rs.event_id = i.event_id;

SELECT p.photographer_name, i.image_url, rs.event_date FROM Photographers p JOIN Images i ON p.photographer_id = i.photographer_id JOIN RunwayShows rs ON i.event_id = rs.event_id ORDER BY rs.event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM runway_shows;
SELECT event_id, event_name, location FROM product_launches;
SELECT event_id, designer, location FROM runway_shows WHERE designer = 'Chanel';
SELECT * FROM event_attendees ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, sponsor_name, sponsorship_level FROM event_sponsors WHERE sponsorship_level = 'Platinum';
SELECT * FROM runway_shows WHERE location = 'Paris' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, launch_date, brand FROM product_launches WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY launch_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name, email FROM runway_shows JOIN event_attendees ON runway_shows.event_id = event_attendees.event_id WHERE designer = 'Chanel' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, photographer_name, description FROM event_shots WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY shot_date DESC;

SELECT event_name, sponsor_name, sponsorship_level FROM runway_shows JOIN event_sponsors ON runway_shows.event_id = event_sponsors.event_id WHERE sponsorship_level = 'Platinum' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
